document_data.name: Rilsa
document_data.mainbody: '''Rilsa''' was a [[ranger]] who lived in and watched over a small stretch of the [[Cloud Peaks]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She was a rather trusting individual and preferred peace over actions of violence.
document_data.Possessions: Among Rilsa's possessions was a small ring given to her by Magreb. It's inscription read: ''"With eternal devorion"''.
document_data.Relationships: Rilsa and Magreb lived their days watching over their small stretch of the world. They were acquainted with a nearby [[wild mage]] hermit by the name of Adoy. While Magreb thought him dangerous, she believed him to just be rather odd.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, a tribe of [[goblin]]s suddenly took up residence in a cave near Magreb and Rilsa's cabin. When Rilsa went to investigate and speak with the goblins, she was killed by those under the rule of the [[hobgoblin]] king, [[Rogdok]]. Her remains were left within the cave.
